concept.title: Orchestrate : .Record Match Initiators - Button Click vWinter-20

conbody.p: Created by Rakesh Singh, last modified on Aug 20, 2021

After you have configured and saved the Definition Initiator, you will see a button labeled Initiate Process on Matching Records. Once clicked, a process will initiate for each record that matches criteria based on the parameters and fields defined in the Definition Initiator and related Definition. Watch the video to see it in action.
